descriptionMain.description: Discover the World Finest Unveiling Exquisite Wines From Across the Globe.
Introducing a New Chapter in Wine Excellence: Connecting Artisans, Distrubutors, and Wine Enthusiasts.
Sip, Share, Connect: Join our Wine Nation, Contact Us.

descriptionMain.title: BARON DEL TANGO
descriptionMain.description: Where Wine and Tango Converge in Harmonious Elegance

Reserva.title: Cabernet Sauvignon

Tasting Notes.Aroma: Spiced with berries and black fruit such as morello cherry and cassis. Notes of tobacco, chocolate and vanilla
Tasting Notes.Mouth: Refined, good tannic character, deep, long aftertaste.

Reserva.Pairing: Red meat, game, pasta with red sauce or pesto sauce, and semi-hard cheese.
